ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 8
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yes I must say I forgot about that.  I did the same at Misty thicket with my store bought bow, even if you miss you get the faction shift.  Two levels huh?
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yes I must say I forgot about that. I did the same at Misty thicket with
my store bought bow, even if you miss you get the faction shift. Two levels
huh? What is the real life time you spent then? aprox?

Jaade,
Indigo Sista Soldier.

> ----------
> From: Paul Jesernig[SMTP:PWJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 7:12 PM
> To: Warrior list
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 8
>
> From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
>
> Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Date: Tue, 18 May 1999 10:21:15 +0900
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> Subject: Re: A question on kill stealing.
>
> I never help unless I am asked to OR the person is most definitely losing
> OR
> after the person has done more than 50% damage to the beast. Then I go
> hell
> for leather, and pull out so I dont get the last swing.
>
> I also like using my bow to help someone without inflicting the majority
> of
> damage.
>
> Jaade,
> Indigo Sista Soldier.<
>
> Another good thing a bow is for is getting faction bumps. As an ogre
> warrior (level 20 CT server) it may be more important for me
> than for most of you. In just two levels of camping on the orcs in
> HighPass
> (maybe 18 hours total time), the guards and citizens
> of High Pass are now amiable to me, a huge improvement from the glowering
> they stared at. Every time another group was
> fighting an orc, I would simply drop a bow shot into it. This gave me
> positive faction with every kill that was done, and I haven't
> met a person yet who gets angry at 10 damage going into a level 16-20 mob.
>
> Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> What was YOUR favorite part?!
> http://www.onelist.com
> Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
>
